title: The Hitchhiker
description: Coop is your average 22 year old male. He loves pizza, junk food, and adventure. His only problem is, when he touches you...he can read your mind?To better understand his "gift", he takes to the road and begins hitchhiking. However, after a hitchhiking experience gone wrong, he wakes up in a hospital bed with a mission he is sure came from God. A mission that means life or death for a new friend. Will this gift that he has frequently hated be what God has given him to succeed?
author: Elle Bee
